pkgmetadata.longdescription: Compute Price of Production and Labor Values // Computes the uniform rate of profit, the vector of price of production and the vector of labor values; and also compute measures of deviation between relative prices of production and relative values. https://scholarworks.umass.edu/econ_workingpaper/347/. You provide the input-output data and 'clptheory' does the calculations for you.
